overview: I am a veterain that owns and operates a Antique shop in Baltimore Maryland. I specialize in Jewelry and U.S. Currency I have recently open a a second store in Savage Mills Maryland. I am looking for Investor to fiance and expansion into the E-Commerce Department and to purchase assets for the business. I have already started entering the e-commerce market useing Etsy and Ebay. I wish to specialize in Vintage, Estate and Fine Jewelry on the web. I am currently going to school to get a bachelors degree in applied science of E-Business Management.
